step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arms overhead and fingers open. Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin.
You're doing well stretching your arms back overhead. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles during this part.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Excellent work stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the good relaxation.
You're consistently completing the repetitions. Focus on maintaining a smooth, controlled movement throughout each push down and stretch.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled. Focus on inhaling as you make a fist and exhale as you stretch your arms back overhead.
